mapper.select: SELECT p.seq, p.category_seq, p.product_name, p.price, p.status, p.quantity, pd.processor, pd.memory, pd.storage, pd.graphics, pd.display, pd.battery, pd.weight, pd.os FROM product p INNER JOIN product_detail pd ON p.seq = pd.product_seq WHERE seller_seq = #{sellerSeq} AND p.seq = #{seq} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO product
category_seq, seller_seq, product_name, price, status, quantity,
VALUES
#{categorySeq}, #{sellerSeq}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{status}, #{quantity},

INSERT INTO product_detail
product_seq, processor, memory, storage, graphics, display, battery, weight, os,
VALUES
#{productSeq}, #{processor}, #{memory}, #{storage}, #{graphics}, #{display}, #{battery}, #{weight}, #{os},
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET category_seq = #{categorySeq}, product_name = #{productName}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, quantity = #{quantity}, updated_at = now() WHERE seller_seq = #{sellerSeq} AND seq = #{seq} AND is_deleted = 0

UPDATE product_detail SET processor = #{processor}, memory = #{memory}, storage = #{storage}, graphics = #{graphics}, display = #{display}, battery = #{battery}, weight = #{weight}, os = #{os} WHERE product_seq = #{productSeq}
